Rod Laver has led the tributes for fellow Australian tennis great Ashley Cooper AO following the former world No.1's passing after a long battle with illness.

articles.title: 'They have our full support': V'landys brokers peace deal with refs - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: A week before the NRL is to resume, another piece of the jigsaw puzzle is in place.
articles.content:
The referees and the NRL have reached an agreement to proceed with one whistle-blower for the resumption of the competition after ARLC chairman Peter Vlandys brokered a last-minute peace deal.
